195.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)

33.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

80.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

266.movie_name: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof (1958)

200.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

39.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
